description: A spooky-themed clutter game. You have to find specific items in the jumbled decorations before the little witches, ghosts and other terrors start knocking on the doors.

name: Professora Abelha Aprendendo Figuras Geométricas

It's the Super Mario Bros. Super Literature Club!
From the creator of block click comes a mod of everyone's favorite horror/anime visual novel that combines it with everyone's favorite animated/live-action television show based on a videogame!

name: Great Game 1/5

Make 10s by sliding and adding numbers together.

Each 10 you make becomes a block and the more blocks there are the trickier it becomes - don't get blocked in.

name: Gravity Machine
description: Venture into the depths of the Gravity Machine and test your sliding skills in this 5-star Mario 64 hack! Made for Simpleflips' Slide Hack Competition (2024)

name: MEIOU and Taxes
description: MEIOU and Taxes is a mod that reworks almost every aspect of Europa Universalis IV. It: adds over fifteen-hundred new provinces; extends the game's timeline (1356-1856); reworks trade, religion, colonization and estates; and adds population, immigration and disease systems to the game.

name: Bandle
description: A daily guessing game in which players aim to determine a mystery song using a limited set of the component tracks. Every incorrect guess will provide more information to help players identify the mystery song.

name: Polar Bowler 1st Frame
description: Send PB flying down the ice and hit as many pins as you can in this arcade-style game.

name: A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead
description: A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead is a single-player horror adventure game inspired by the critically acclaimed blockbuster movie franchise that highlights a unique survivor story after an invasion of deadly creatures. In this exclusive spin-off, experience the journey of a young woman who must endure a treacherous apocalypse in the midst of interpersonal family conflicts, all while coming to terms with her own inner fears.

name: Posh Boutique 2
description: After taking over her grandmother's line of fancy clothing stores, Alicia finds out she's won the lottery! With her winnings in hand, Alicia's ready to take her Posh Boutique to the next level. Help Alicia expand her business by assisting each customer in their search for the perfect outfit, adding just the right accessories, and choosing the best upgrades and enhancements for each location.

name: Sheep's Symphony
description: Shee's Symphony is a rhythm runner fangame. Choose from a selection of outfits, stages, and enemies, and aim for the best ranking in each song!

name: CoverQuest
description: CoverQuest is a daily guessing game which presents players with a highly pixelated image of a video game cover. The player attempts to guess the title of the game cover presented; each incorrect guess reveals a more detailed image of the game cover.

name: Basandere
description: Play as the mythical basandere from Basque mythology and explore the gorgeous landscapes of Basque country while helping people along the way.

name: Rainbow Mosaics 12: Easter Helper
description: A nonogram game with puzzles themed around the easter bunny & eggs.

name: Rainbow Mosaics: Christmas Lights
description: A festive nonogram game with 100 puzzles to solve.

name: Rainbow Mosaics: Blooming Garden
description: This is a nonogram game with 120 puzzles to solve.

name: PopIdle
description: A daily guessing game in which players are tasked to guess the mystery album of the day when given a highly pixelated version of the album cover. Each incorrect guess makes the album picture quality better, providing more information. Players can also play through all previous daily challenges at their leisure.

name: Midnight Castle
description: Start searching for magical items now! Unveil mysterious treasures and characters and test your wits and dexterity in this enigmatic world. In Midnight Castle, you never know what might happen next...

Your name is Net. you are a girl of few hobbies and even fewer friends.

A new experimental type of virtual reality has begun development, and you could be a potential tester. Do you have what it takes? Do you want it badly enough?

Do you want to experience true escapism?

name: Yeti Quest: Crazy Penguins
description: Help Yeti and his crazy penguin pals save their Antarctic island home from the ice storm! Explore 100 exciting, challenging match-3 levels on the snow-covered island and lead the penguin team safely through the many dangers.

name: Yeti Legend: Mystery of the Forest
description: When a chemical spill spreads into the forest, creatures larger than life start emerging from the shadows - and right into your own backyard. Fight to survive as you attempt to solve the mystery in this hide-and-seek hidden object adventure.

name: Everseed
description: Everseed is a strategic defense game with a player-owned economy. Rangers unite with companion animals, plants, and alchematons to safeguard Sunhaven, humanity’s final remaining city in the Wandering Isles, from the malevolent forces of Blight

name: Secret Archives
description: This is a third person shooter game The main plot is a secret experiment being conducted somewhere in the future During this process, a strange mineral was discovered and caused a large-scale infection The protagonist's task is to retrieve important "files" and escape from this place!

description:
The Candide Laptop is educational, bilingual (Portuguese and English) and comes with different activities, such as: music, letters, words, spelling, questions and answers, addition, division and others. There are countless activities for children to learn wherever they are.

You can learn while playing with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles educational laptop for kids! This toy laptop has a beautiful design inspired by your favorite characters!

Playing games will be much more fun with the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles laptop!

name: Deep Beyond
description: Deep Beyond Is a first-person interactive thriller about a sea explorer and the mystery behind her father’s disappearance.

name: The Joy of Creation
description:
The classic Five Nights at Freddy’s fan-game returns, rebuilt from the ground up to offer a modern and immersive horror experience with real-time graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5.

The Joy of Creation puts you in the shoes of The Creator, a game developer forced to confront the manifestations of his own mind throughout five unique levels, each with a unique blend of free-roaming and classic sit-and-survive gameplay mechanics.

This game is officially backed by Scott Cawthon as part of the Fazbear Fanverse Initiative.

name: MP3: Star Summit
description: Sin descripción

name: Echoes of The Deep
description:
Echoes of The Deep is a pixelart roguelite dungeon game where you fight your way through the levels of the dungeon. In these levels you'll encounter different enemies, treasures and more. This game features and adaptive difficulty system that will adhere to how you perform.

Will you overcome the dungeon a victor, or will you succumb to the Echoes of The Deep like the many before you..

name: As We Descend
description: The roguelike deckbuilder with the soul of a strategy game. Recruit, upgrade, and deploy your forces in tactical battles against corrupt creatures. Make hard decisions in humanity’s final city to bolster your odds. Will you break the cycle of endless descent?

name: Yarn
description: Yarn is a indie 2d atmospheric platformer with a cute little character super hero - Doodle! Jump through this diverse, gorgeous galaxy world and explore Meow Town or the Scratchy Dungeons but watch out for the monster zombie cats! This corky jumper is a furry of fun!

name: Yarn
description: In Yarn you control the character by using just a single button. Avoid the traps, collect the stars and stomp on the zombie cats to complete each level. This version of the game is a PICO-8 demake of the iOS game Yarn.

name: Void Protocol
description: Fight your way through up to nine levels, firing and collecting your projectile. Can you find all three endings? Defeat the enemies, seal the breach, repeat!

name: Tile Connect Master: Match fun
description:
Does it look easy?
You can try and have fun with the casual puzzle game, which is simple to use and can exercise your brain.

name: Overwatch 2: Season 10 - Venture Forth
description: Drill into the competition with the newest damage hero Venture, discover a world turned over with a new Mirrorwatch event, explore an updated Mythic system, and more.

name: Void Keeper
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of our mobile game and uncover the secrets hidden behind each portal! Embark on adventures alongside the main character, Bizi, who manages monsters and portals.

name: Tiny Tires
description: Race around coffee cups and jump off notepads in Tiny Tires - a simple, fast-paced miniature racing game. A throwback to classic racing games, featuring a top-down perspective making it easy to keep an eye on any opponents trying to get one up on you.

name: Thinkin' Things: Sky Island Mysteries
description:
Solve Mysteries and Bring Order Back to the Sky Islands!

Break out your logic, prioritization and decision-making skills—you’ll find hundreds of zany and absorbing challenges at the Sky Islands! The more problems you complete, the more clues you pick up for the mysteries. Then zip on over to Clue Central and help Detective Joe Cluestoe and his sidekick, Spike, identify who’s behind each daring deed.

name: Transformers Rescue Bots: Dash
description: Assemble all the Rescue Bots and go on an action-packed adventure to save the world from the evil Dr. Morocco! Rescue citizens, outrun disasters and chase down Morbots. Avoid obstacles, collect Energon and morph from bot to vehicle to epic DinoBot! Roll to the rescue!

name: JumpStart Artist
description: Introduce children to art fundamentals with a complete set of easy-to-use design and media tools that include 40 printable activities and 60 project starters. Your child will meet famous artists, explore artistic style, and discover different genres while learning art basics including line, shape, color, texture, and pattern. A robust art kit, with an animation feature, lets kids paint, draw, and design unique masterpieces. Encourage your budding artists while helping them meet the National Standards for the Arts.

name: Hand of the Divine
description: A highscore solitaire deckbuilder where you manage the spheres of influence for the world's divinities. Play and purchase cards to gather as much influence as possible within a limited number of turns.

name: Balloon Knight
description: When the dark lord returns to the world after a thousand-year slumber, only the valiant Balloon Knight can save the world.

name: Icy Dungeon
description: Cursed to conjure a slick trail of ice with each step you take, navigate puzzles and obstacles with precision and wit. Can you outsmart the icy curse and escape the cold depths of the dungeon?

name: Massmouthmas
description:
It's a Massmouth Christmas special! Massmouthmas takes place after the events of Massmouth 1 but before Massmouth 2.

The protagonist Massmouth is on winter vacation in a remote cabin when employment benefactor The Worm calls over video with an urgent problem. A friend of The Worm owns a toy factory near Massmouth's holiday spot that is malfunctioning and it must be fixed immediately. With a promise of compensation, Massmouth heads out into the cold see what they can do.

name: How Not To Be Seen!
description: How Not To Be Seen! is a jokewad without gameplay: it consists instead of a 1:59 machinima adaptation of a Monty Python sketch of the same name.

name: Shopping Clutter 13: Mr. Claus On Vacation
description: Sin descripción

name: MassMouth 2
description: MassMouth must embark on a journey to save his boss, The Worm, who is kidnapped by a mysterious group of aliens.

name: The Adventures of MassMouth
description: MassMouth is an alien from the planet Zeeble (a zeebloid). He has a small, green body with a large mouth. MassMouth is an employee of The Worm, a rich alien with his own personal moon. The Worm employs MassMouth to bring him various valuable items. MassMouth is very well-paid and has his own personal room.

name: Doodle God Solitaire
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Mr The Killer
description:
You play the character of "The Killer" : an autistic hitman disguised as Death.

Your boat sank and the ocean current carried you to the nearby shores. These are, unfortunately, those of a country where you are wanted by police for past misdeeds. You will have to show skill and courage to get you out of this bad situation. Will you successfully lead The Killer to the neighbouring border, to a place where he would escape his pursuers?

name: Undertale Red & Yellow
description: Have you played Undertale Yellow? After completing it, did you think: "Man, I really wanna replay Undertale now, but I've already played it so many times..." No? WELL TOO BAD! Introducing: Undertale Red & Yellow! An Undertale mod designed to scratch that Undertale Yellow itch!

name: WGSpace
description: WGSpace episode is a 8 level episode for Duke Nukem 3D.

name: WGRealms
description: WGRealms is a 5 level adventure Episode for DukeNukem 3D

name: Haunted Nukem
description: Duke is having a nightmare, what he does not realize is how much blood lies ahead. Duke has to take the (blood) elevators to the core of the horror and stop the beast. The aliens that Duke has killed in the past have somehow brought Duke into a realm that doesn't exist. Its a dark place with almost no escape. If Duke can't make it through he will never awaken this deep sleep.

name: Running Fred
description: Running Fred combines ridiculously natural controls and fast-paced action with the shameless buckets of blood praised in its prequel, creating a fantastic third-person platformer unmatched on mobile devices!

name: DoDonPachi DaiOuJou
description: A port of DoDonPachi DaiOuJou for Japanese mobile phones released in 2003.

name: Hack 6
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Sea Battle 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Horror Hospital 2: Survival
description: As you wander the corridors of the hospital, your eyes may encounter ghosts and paranormal creatures at any moment.

name: A Proper Cup of Tea
description: Terry Cavanagh guides you through making the perfect S-rank cup of tea.

name: That
description: The game features abstract surreal scenery and doesn't really contain an objective, it is more of a game to relax to and explore.

name: Super Slime: Black Hole Game
description: Super Slime is a black hole game that can swallow everything near you! Your mouth is a black hole that swallows everything smaller than you. To eat larger things, move around smoothly like a snake and devour more and more.

name: GHGuessr
description: GHGuessr is a community game for BastiGHG, in which players have to guess which video it is based on 3 screenshots.

name: Eyes: Nonogram
description:
This logic puzzle can help relieve your stress.
Reveal hidden pictures by using number clues!
Follow simple rules to deduce the correct answers and complete the nice dot pixel pictures.
We've prepared relaxing music, smooth designs, help messages, and improved functions for your convenience.
Play Eyes: Nonograms and take a break from your busy daily life.
Like logic puzzles? Start Eyes: Nonograms now!
Follow simple rules and complete nice dot pixel pictures.
There are hundreds of fun, free puzzles that you can collect.
Collect a variety of dot pixel puzzle pictures with your friends and family!

name: Deadliest Warrior: Battlegrounds
description: Head onto the first-person melee multiplayer battlefield with an army of warriors. Pit an army of Knights, Spartans, Samurai, Vikings, Ninjas or Pirates against one another or send a mixed unit into battle for a fantasy match-up of warriors, weapons and skill. Each warrior brings with them an exclusive set of weapons and strengths to prove their superiority in the art of warfare. With numerous game modes and extensive customization play out every scenario in a battle to the death and determine who is the deadliest warrior.

name: Warlords
description: A multiplayer classic that resurrects the competitive spirit of arcade games from years gone by. Knock out the other kings in their castles while keeping yourself protected at the same time. Up to four players can join the action with the game taking control of any vacant castles allowing for a variety of single- or multiplayer experiences. The Evo mode allows players to import their own pictures to their castles.

name: Legacy: The Lost Pyramid
description: You're an archaeologist who sets out on an adventure to find a dear friend who's gone missing in an ancient pyramid. In the pyramid you encounter riddles and puzzles that need to be solved to take you to the next room, and hopefully your friend.

name: Battlezone
description: The original tank vs. tank action classic has received an Xbox Live overhaul, adding in new multiplayer modes including Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch and Capture the Flag. This updated version also includes the original game. Players can use the Xbox Live Vision camera to watch live video of their opponents. Additionally, there are new special effects for weapon firing, impacts and explosions.

name: Wood Blocks 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Pandamino
description: Sin descripción

name: Arms Remix
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Shoreline
description: Explore, Clean & Restore as a Cute Character in this Cozy Cleaning Mini-Adventure!

name: Decolonators
description: Kick capitalist colonizer butts out of Vietnam in retro-arcade game glory!

name: Rewritten
description: A cozy, humorous fantasy romance that'll have you fall in love with reading all over again. If you can't pick a boy, pick them all! or give this quiz a spin.

name: Cursed Place
description:
Down the moor, there's a cursed place. Don't wander there if you cherish your life.

Cursed Place is a Visual Novel made in two parts. The first part was made for the 2022 Amare Jam in the span of the month of April. The second was finished during the month of May 2022.

name: Angelblood
description: Sin descripción

name: Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Jigsaw Puzzle is a puzzle game written that was included by Apple Computer with System 7.5 to Mac OS 9.2.2.

Options include toggling sound effects, choosing the piece size for new puzzles, pasting a custom image for use as a puzzle, and setting the background color behind the puzzle pieces.

name: Pool Nation
description:
Pool Nation is the ultimate Pool Simulator for PlayStation4. Prepare yourself for pixel perfect physics, photo-realistic graphics and super detailed visuals in this truly immersive representation of the sport.

Play live matches seamlessly online, compete in Leagues, share, challenge and enroll in the Pool Nation Cup, explore our unique rule set customization tool and re-discover this much-loved sport.

name: Kinect Fun Labs: 5 Micro Lab Challenge
description: Players can challenge themselves in a microscale world of 5 where speed and timing is everything. Jump and duck to avoid obstacles, and unlock doors with quick reflex memory puzzles.

name: Super Mafia Land
description: Run, jump, and throw your way across a land of mobsters. Not quite sure why they are there, but all they know is that trouble is afoot and they're here to save the day. Use your mafia friends to fight across three sprawling stages. Toss your enemies and use local vegetation in defense. Collect fruit to heal and spend in the bonus round! Save the world in the only way you know how... well you'll see.

name: Call of Duty: Legacy
description: Call of Duty: Legacy is a bundle pack consisting of Call of Duty: Finest Hour and Call of Duty 2: Big Red One.

name: Call of Duty 2: Big Red One - Collector's Edition
description:
Call of Duty 2: Big Red One also has a Collector's Edition that contains a bonus DVD with:

- Four exclusive character skins for multiplayer gameplay – using Elite soldier models.

- Interviews, MoCap/VO session footage of the in-game voice actors from the cast of Band of Brothers.

- Interviews with WWII veterans of the Big Red One, including memories of in-game events.

- Multiplayer map fly-through's with DVD-style developer commentary (tips, interesting facts, etc.).

- Behind the scenes with Treyarch, discussing the development of Call of Duty 2: Big Red One.

- Concept and production art gallery (art, sketches, storyboards, renders, etc.).

name: Super Mario 64 in GTA San Andreas
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Duty 3: Special Edition
description: This special edition is a re-release of the original game for PlayStation 2 that includes a bonus disc with video interviews.

name: MKDD Extended v2.0
description: A major update for MKDD Extended, which added many custom tracks and battle arenas.

name: Call of Duty 2: Bonus Map Pack
description: Bonus Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 2 featuring two new maps: Vossenack and Wallendar. The map pack was free and like all the DLC released for Call of Duty 2 it was only available on Xbox 360.

name: Call of Duty 2: Skirmish Map Pack
description: Skirmish Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 2 featuring two new maps: Beaumont-Hague and Kalach. Like all the DLC released for Call of Duty 2 it was only available on Xbox 360.

name: Call of Duty 2 - Invasion Map Pack
description: Invasion Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 2 featuring five new maps: Crossroads, Newvillers, Normandy, Decoytown, and Rostov. Like all the DLC released for Call of Duty 2 it was only available on Xbox 360.

name: Ocarina of Time: Chaos Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Duty 3: Valor Map Pack
description: Valor Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 3 featuring five new maps. The maps included are Stalag 23, Crossing, Ironclad, La Bourgade, and Wildwood.

name: Call of Duty 3: Bravo Map Pack
description: Bravo Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 3 featuring three new maps and two returning maps from Call of Duty, and Call of Duty: United Offensive. The new maps are Rimling, Aller Haut, and Seine River. Gare Centrale returns from Call of Duty, and Marseilles from Call of Duty: United Offensive.

name: Call of Duty 2
description: A port of Call of Duty 2 compatible with an array of Windows Mobile based smartphones and pocket PCs.

name: Project Reality
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Duty 3
description: The mobile port of Call of Duty 3 by Hands-On Mobile (formerly MFORMA) which is played from a top-down perspective.

name: Super Mario Bro-op
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Galaxy 2: Master Mode
description: Sin descripción

name: Beyond Melee
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Riders DX v2.0
description: Sonic Riders DX Version 2.0 features new characters, new cosmetics, new super forms, improved gameplay, revamped stages, revamped gears, quality of life and mechanical fixes, and improvements to competitive balance from the previous versions of Sonic Riders DX.

name: Super Mario Land Remix
description: Sin descripción

name: Koppotate's Rescue Mission
description: Sin descripción

name: Tales of the World: Material Dungeon
description: Tales of the World: Material Dungeon is a spin-off game released on January 31, 2008 in Japan only for mobile cellphones. Twins Lene and Rio pursue a variety of quests in order to recover four lost elemental roots. The materials they receive at the end of each quest can be used to make costumes. When a character puts those on, they gain the abilities of the costume's related class.

name: Tales of the World: Tactics Union
description: Revalia is a world formed from the dreams of people from countless different worlds. As long as there are those who dream, it continues to exist; when they cease to dream, the world will die. Within Revalia resides the Rufres tribe, whose duty is to keep the balance in the world by purifying the nightmares of the people, the incarnation of the people's darkness in their hearts called Vuul.

name: Tales of the World: Dice Adventure
description: Tales of the World: Dice Adventure is a web browser-based board game in the Tales series released April 26, 2012 in Japan. The game is a role-playing and board game hybrid, where the player rolls virtual dice to determine how much a character moves across the board. Through the course of traversing the board, the player can form parties with other characters, experience story events, and participate in battles.

name: El cuerpo humano con Pipo
description:
The Human Body with Pipo is a program with which, in a simple, fun and practical way, children will investigate the inside of the human body,
fun and practical way, children will investigate the inside of the human body.
It is aimed at children from 5 to 12 years of age; however, in its easier levels, some of the games are very stimulating from the age of 4, especially the Puzzles or the Pairs. This product can be adapted depending on the age, needs and abilities of each subject.
The product is structured in 14 themes that are dealt with in the presentation
(robot screen) and 9 different activities where to experiment and to be able to
understand the functioning of the human body: what is hidden under the skin, what are the bones for?
What happens to food after it passes through the mouth? etc.

The duration of each game varies depending on the child's learning pace and motivation of the child. In addition, some games have several levels of difficulty. There is no time pressure and at any time the game can be interrupted and the child can leave the game.
They are very stimulating games, which quickly capture the child's interest. Although
some of the learning that is presented is of a later evolutionary stage, he can always manipulate them in some way.

name: Skyland Wars
description: Skyland Wars is a strategy game set in the world of sky islands. In this fantasy-filled sky world, you can send airship teams to freely navigate the sky, gather resources, and drive away roaming air pirates to construct your own sky city. You can also explore ruins and dungeons full of unknowns and challenges. Each adventure is a completely new experience, as you delve into dungeons with your heroes and troops, searching for ancient treasures while resisting unpredictable enemies and traps.

name: Histoire
description: Histoire is a free-to-play dungeon exploration RPG made in RPG Maker 2000 by t-k. It has a high degree of freedom and it released in 2003.

name: Tales of Bibliotheca
description: Tales of Bibliotheca is a scenario, collection-style mobile app game for the iOS that provides an alternative experience to existing games in the Tales series. Chapters 1-12 of the app covers Tales of Vesperia, and while the game has its own unique battle system and original scenes, each of the chapters contains new illustrations and scenarios from notable scenes in the game.

name: Tales of Card Evolve
description: Tales of Card Evolve is a mobile social game for GREE that was first announced during the Tales of Festival 2012. It was launched on June 3, 2012.

name: Inkonbini
description: inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a slice-of-life narrative-driven simulation game centered around a small-town convenience store in the early 1990s. Shelve goods, engage in meaningful conversations with your customers, and explore the ways you can impact their lives with your decisions.

name: Tales of Kizna
description: Tales of Kizna is a mobile social game that was released in Japan on November 22, 2011. The game involves acquiring cards of Tales characters, sometimes in special costumes, and assembling a team of four, just as the battle party in other games, to fight against monsters. Tapping the screen allows for attacking, and fights are won based on attack and defense being higher than that of the opponent's.

name: Tales of Mobile: Reversi
description: A Tales of Mobile version of the classic board game that features characters from other Tales games playing against each other.

name: Tales of Mobile: Klondike
description: A Tales of Mobile take on the traditional card game Klondike, a game similar to Solitaire that can be played by only one person. While playing the game, the fairy character from Tales of Tactics offers her insight.

name: Angry Penguin
description:
Angry Penguin is a challenging platformer with numerous and varied trials, where every step is a difficulty.
The game features an integrated timer, so no need to worry about LiveSplit when you want to start a playthrough!
Will you be able to collect all the hidden eggs ?

name: Craymel Check
description: Craymel Check features characters known as Craymels in a number of small mini-games. The artwork and character design of the Craymels themselves are based on the ones from Tales of Eternia, specifically.

name: Tales of Mobile: Craymel Lab
description: Craymel Lab is a puzzle game that consists of the player moving falling blocks of different colors and shapes into an arrangement and making them disappear, similar in many ways to Tetris.

name: Tales of Mobile: Groovy Arche
description: Groovy Arche is a minigame from the PlayStation version of Tales of Phantasia that was re-released as part of the Tales of Mobile series. Groovy Arche sees the player assuming the role of Arche Klein as she flies across a horizontally scrolling screen, blasting enemies with upgrade-able magic spells and dodging up and down to avoid incoming fire.

name: Tales of Mobile: Whis Battle
description: Whis Battle pits the player against other characters from that title in a card game. Each character takes turns playing a card from his or her hand onto the table, and only cards of the same color may be placed on one another. However, some cards are given two colors and may be used to switch whichever card the next player must lay. If a player is unable to place a card, he or she must draw cards until they can play. The game ends when a player no longer has any cards in his or her hand. In addition to featuring the Whis card game, the game is accompanied by several small story sequences involving characters from Tales of Eternia.

name: Tales of Mobile: Tales of Quiz
description: Tales of Quiz is a quiz game with questions given by characters the Tales universe. It includes monthly updated questions and a national ranking for the player to participate.

name: Tales of Mobile: Tales of Wonder Casino
description: Tales of Wonder Casino is a minigame compilation in the Tales of Mobile series. Four casino games from the series, as well as a new one, are available to play. Coins won allow the player to purchase the clothing of various Tales heroes, which then become playable characters.

name: Tales of Mobile: Tales of Tactics
description:
Tales of Tactics is a turn-based strategy game with a system resembling the one in Tales of the World: Narikiri Dungeon 3. The game sees players recruiting different characters from other Tales games and using their skills to battle monsters across numerous boards.
The heroes find themselves in a world unknown to them, and there, they meet a strange fairy named Rukku, who guides them around this strange world. The heroes work together in order to stop the relentless Black Army that has been threatening the world. For their plans to work, the heroes search and recruit more people, Tales series characters, for their cause. The question of whether or not these heroes will be able to return to their original worlds lingers over them while they search for a motive behind the Black Army's actions. In this new world where everything has been set, a new adventure unfolds as the all-girl Cardinals Scenes fight against the Black Army to protect that which they hold dear.

name: Tales of Mobile: Tales of Breaker
description: Tales of Breaker is the first role-playing game in the Tales of Mobile series. The story follows the adventures of a young girl named Mika, who must travel the world in order to stop a rising evil from engulfing the land. She is joined by her companions: Yuteki, Evelyn, Sauber, RuRu, and Berger. The game introduces the 2-on-2 Linear Motion Battle System.

name: Tales of Mobile: Tales of Commons
description: Tales of Commons is a role-playing game that takes place in the world of Yupitel, and stars main characters Alvin and Sefina, along with their party members, Seiun and You. Like Tales of Breaker, it utilizes a variation of the Linear Motion Battle System. It was the first Tales of Mobile game to contain a theme song: Kana Uemura's Kiseki.

name: Tales of the Abyss: Mieu no Daibouken
description: Mieu no Daibouken is an action role-playing game starring Mieu, the mascot of Tales of the Abyss. A total of twelve dungeons are available to the player for download. Mieu, using his abilities gained from the Sorcerer's Ring, is supposed to reach the bottom of the dungeon, at which point one of the characters from Abyss will give the player a password. This password can be redeemed in Tales of the Abyss for items.

name: Tales of the Abyss: Mieu no Fonic Gojiten
description: Mieu no Fonic Gojiten is a text converter that allows a person to convert words into the fonic alphabet of Tales of the Abyss. There is also an option to attempt to decipher words without help. Success gives the ability to download an Tales of the Abyss-related picture.

name: Tales of the Abyss: Mieu no Jikkenshitsu?
description: Mieu no Jikkenshitsu? is a cooking game where the player gives Mieu various ingredients to have him make a dish.

name: Tales of Mobile: Tales of Wahrheit
description: Tales of Wahrheit is a role-playing game similar to Tales of Breaker and Tales of Commons. "Wahrheit" is the German word for "truth". The main characters of the game are 16-year-old Seltz Vakstrum and Vila Czarheit, and they are accompanied by Blitz Vinte, Kalulu von Atmigar, Gamut, and Ray Sonne. A theme song by JAMOSA feat. CORN HEAD called Ienaiyo accompanies the game. This is the last of the three Tales mobile titles with their own self-contained stories and characters.

name: SM64: Decades Later
description:
This hacks aims to recreate and reimagine vanilla SM64 levels from memory and remove stupid stars that I never liked in the original.

That said, some levels will be similar to vanilla while others will feel like fully new levels, because of how bad the originals were e.g. Course 15.

If you desire new stuff, the endgame close to 150 stars is filled with new original stages just like SM64DS had new levels.

name: Tales of Mobile: Scramble Land
description: Scramble Land is a board game for the mobile phone. The player controls one of the Tales heroes, attempting to amass as much money as possible.

name: Red Red Tarmac: XL Deluxe
description:
The sky is the wrong colour. Go on a road trip with your weird friend to explore an abandoned pizza joint.

A short, vaguely apocalyptic, queer slice of life visual novel.

name: Venus & Braves: Majo to Megami to Horobi no Yogen
description: The PSP remake of Venus & Braves, released January 20, 2011. The remake features cameos from characters of Namco Bandai's RPGs - the Tales of series and Xenosaga.

name: Green Green 2: Koi no Special Summer
description: As the new school year begins in Kanenone Gakuen, so does a new era as it becomes a co-educational school! You are Midorikawa Yutaka, a new first-year student who initially was wary of other students, but as they lived together in the dormitory, they gradually became your friends. Although school life was inconvenient to the point of death, everyone was enjoying it in their own way, until one day... when it was announced its closure! Students were divided and chaos surged between those who wanted the school to stay open and those who wanted it closed. What is the fate of Kanenone Gakuen? And what will happen to Yutaka and his friends' school life and love?

name: Keroro Gunsou: Enshuu Dayo! Zenin Shuugou Part 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Mitsukete! Keroro Gunsou: Machigai Sagashi Daisakusen de Arimasu!
description: Sin descripción

name: Green Green 3: Hello, Goodbye
description:
It has been a year since the Kanenone Gakuen transitioned into a co-ed school, integrating female students into a previously all-male high school. The school closure riots that followed were temporarily settled and the summer vacation was coming to an end by August. Yuusuke and Futaba are still fighting as usual, but they managed to keep it afloat. Everything seemed normal again, until suddenly... a fire broke out in the girls' dormitory! And now the girls have to live alongside the boys in their dormitory.
Yuusuke tries his best to make love amid all this, but he is now in trouble when a girl he has known since childhood shows up, and he starts to share a room with twin sisters!
An unprecedented ordeal looms before the two of them!
This is the final part of the series, filled with joy and conflict!

name: Maximum Carnage Return
description: Maximum Carnage Returns is an OpenBOR beat 'em up game created by Silas Elrick Heat and HeatGames. This fan-made reboot/remake of the 16-bit classic from 1994 SNES, Maximum Carnage, features three playable characters: Spider-Man, Venom and the successful inclusion of Deadpool.

name: Green Green: Kanenone Dynamic
description: An expanded console port of Green Green designed to be "energetic and groovy". It adds two new heroines, scenarios for males, new artwork, new closing songs for the original five girls, and a built-in CG gallery.

name: Green Green: Kanenone Romantic
description: An expanded console port of Green Green focused on the "solitude" romance part of the game. It adds two new heroines, new artwork, new closing songs for the original five girls, and a built-in CG gallery.

name: Path of Exile: Necropolis
description:
Path of Exile: Necropolis is an expansion of Path of Exile. It was officially announced by Grinding Gear Games on March 8, 2024, and will release on March 29, 2024 alongside the Necropolis league.

The main content of this expansion is the Necropolis league, as well as major changes to the endgame, including new Tier 17 maps and bosses, a rework to scarabs, and the ability to have multiple Atlas Passive Skill Tree layouts. The expansion also includes adjustments to the Act campaign and a slew of quality-of-life changes.

name: Nadeshiko's Dollhouse
description:
What if you were never truly in control?

Play as Nadeshiko, a sweet doll who has been waiting to meet her new owner, Nicole. Explore your surroundings to learn more about the family and uncover lingering secrets of the past. It's no surprise that dolls have always been an item of comfort for children.

Now it's your turn to take on this role and fulfill your purpose.

name: Food Truck Pup: Cooking Chef
description: Work with dogs to build a global crepe business.

name: Don't Rock The Boat
description:
An interactive horror story by elliot degrassi

A women's crew team plagued with internal debate over who is allowed to row in their league finds themselves stalked by a river monster.

This is a story for mature audiences. Content warnings: transphobia, implied sexual assault (off-screen).

Beating one of these mini-games awards you gold. If you complete all three mini-games on the island, you conquer it. When you're not on an island, you can sail freely and sink enemy ships to earn even more gold.

description: Pokémon: Battle Trainer was a series of electronic toys. It is the successor to the THINKChip Interactive System and utilized the THINKChip+ within Pokémon figures made for the game system.

description: KarmaRun is an endless runner in which players can control some of the most famous youtubers in Spain. Or rather not, since by default we will control a generic character, and we will need to pay money if we want to control any of these youtubers.

name: Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games: Virtual Card Album
description: Mario & Sonic - London 2012 Virtual Card Album was a free downloadable app associated with Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games that was released in Europe by Nintendo and Sega under license from the International Olympic Committee to correspond with the 2012 London Olympics. When first announced at the June 2012 Nintendo Direct, it was called Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games Virtual Card Album.

name: Saber y Ganar
description:
The game of the cultural contest of La2 of TVE presented by Jordi Hurtado arrives. Saber y ganar has completed fifteen years on the air and has become the daily program with more years of broadcasting in the history of television in Spain.

Now you can be a contestant thanks to this RTVE.es game with thousands of questions from real tests of the program and test yourself in the contest.

At "Bunny Garden", you can enjoy drinking with the adorable staff, and develop relationships.
Forget about your daily stress and enjoy to your heart's content.
Your choices will shape the narrative. The fate of your relationships rests solely in your hands.

name: Final Fight And Cadillacs

Embark on an adventure in this unique grocery shop where every day is a joyous animal jam.

a chronic illness simulation game.

you think you have a chronic illness, but you don't know what. all you know is you are always in some state of pain. you've been to too many doctors to count... but you still have to live your life.

how long will it take for you to get a diagnosis?

The entire Solar System, better yet, Milky Way, is at your disposal!

A man has stalked you ever since you were a child. You call him Geist. You're not sure who...or what he is. When you befriend a new boy at college, Geist will do anything to keep you in his grasp.

name: PO'ed: Definitive Edition
description:
It's a remaster of 1995's shooter PO’ed. It fixes bugs present in the original game and brings several QoL features to enhance the gameplay, plus a new hardcore difficulty. However, these are togglable features which means the players can also play the remastered version with the bugs and without the QoL features.

The remaster also supports widescreen modes with properly adjusted HUD. In addition, there are 15 achievements to hunt for. PO’ed: Definitive Edition can be played with enhanced controls, antialiasing and increased framerate up to 4K 144 frames per second performance.

Players must decipher this Keyword through a series of word puzzles akin to the popular NY Times word game to weaken the Lexicon Lord before engaging in battle!

Catch fish to earn points and climb to the top of the rankings in the amateur, pro, and elite circuits, but watch out for surprises swimming just below the surface that will slow you down.

Popgoes is an official Five Nights at Freddy's spinoff series, produced by Scott Cawthon and developed by fans as part of the "Fazbear Fanverse Initiative".

MyPopgoes is a short and simple resource management minigame, where you take care of an extremely needy weasel named Popgoes. Housed in an adorable plastic LCD toy, your new pixelated best friend will need pizza, fizzy drinks, and only the best entertainment provided by Freddy Fazbear himself. And if Popgoes doesn't receive what he desperately needs, he passes out. Or maybe he straight up dies. Up to your imagination.

name: Rainbow Cotton
description:
Dive right into this 3D rail shooter as the young witch Cotton, accompanied by her trusty fairy friend, Silk. Lured by the promise of delicious Willow, help Cotton confront the wicked demon, Tweed, and his legions of followers who have stolen the Legendary Willow from the enchanting land of York Country. Hop on your broomstick and go to town in this wacky adventure!

Rainbow Cotton features exciting gameplay reminiscent of its predecessor, the classic game Panorama Cotton. The game takes you on an arcade-inspired journey through a fantastic world full of surprises and challenges. Every stage in Rainbow Cotton is guarded by peculiar bosses that puts your skills to the test. Collect power-ups, build up your flashy projectiles, and hurl them at colorful enemies. Use powerful magic attacks to clear the screen with fireballs and lightning. Only the most courageous (or stubborn, Willow-obsessed!) witches will prevail!

The charming 3D graphics will leave you mesmerized as you travel through, for example, a cozy moonlit town draped in Christmas lights, a mysterious sunken forest, and a magical castle above the clouds!

description: Digitalize your toys from the Kinder Surprise chocolate by scanning the figurines or QR codes. You can then play with your characters, play minigames and design your own avatar and while doing this your kids can learn the world.

name: Pan
description: Make GOD happy and get three coins from your neighbors by using your very limited communication skills of Hitting, Crying, Imitating Micael or Repeating the last thing the person said.

name: Makibishi Comic
description: After 17 years, they are back! A remastered version of the point-and-click game that was released on the web in 2007. Is it a game? Is it experimental interactive content? Even the creator doesn't know. Experience a strange and unique worldview that has been played over 10 million times worldwide!

name: Japan Train Models: JR Freight Edition
description: Japan Train Models 4th edition features trains from JR Freight Japan! Japan Train Models is a model train puzzle and layout crafting game for model train fans that allows you to create "Train Models" and "Scenery" just like a puzzle.

name: Riki
description: Help ranger Riki to fight an unknown menace which could destroy not only the Amazon forest but the entire world. A fast and yet challenging game.

name: Hurricane
description: This is a reaction type small game with simple operation, and the movement direction keys can control the movement of characters.

name: Pipeline RTX: 2
description: PIPELINE RTX: 2 is a puzzle game. The goal of the game is incredibly simple: you need to turn various parts of the pipe into certain positions so that in the end the water can, albeit with a large number of convolutions, pass through the water supply.

name: Mystical Tactics
description: Mystical Tactics is a turn-based tactical-RPG roguelike in which you control a squad of adventurers in a mystical world. Train your heroes in fast-paced tactical battles, equip them with powerful items and lead them to repel the Dark Lord and his legions.

name: SnowRunner: The Atom
description: The SnowRunner garage expands once more with the Azov 67096-3N “Atom”! This Heavy-class truck features a modern engine, always-on differential lock and all-wheel drive capability. This DLC is not included in the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 or Year 4 Pass.

name: Mole Gem Mayhem
description: Sin descripción

name: Criminal Archives: Murder in the Pages Collector's Edition
description: There's no such thing as a perfect crime! You have to solve a series of mysterious murders in San Francisco. It turns out that this bright city has its own dark side...

name: Criminal Archives: Murder in the Pages DLC
description: There's no such thing as a perfect crime! You have to solve a series of mysterious murders in San Francisco. It turns out that this bright city has its own dark side...
